data: {"concept_id": "wound", "concept_name": "Character Wound", "type": "element", "definition": "The persistent emotional injury that shapes perception, behavior, relationships, and arcs.", "scope_notes": "Wounds show up as hints → habits → triggers → fallout → attempts at coping/healing. Strength dials Low→Medium→High and should ebb/flow across the story.", "axes": "phase|strength", "axis_values": "hint|habit|trigger|fallout|healing | low|medium|high", "pairs_well_with": "motivation|drive|identity|truth|backstory|role_interactions|decision_style", "conflicts_with": "checkbox_backstory|pain_olympics|flaw_confusion|static_wound|resetting", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_wound_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_wound_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_hint", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "hint", "description": "Subtle cues implying the wound without naming it.", "detection_hint": "Guarded jokes, avoidance, small rituals, soft body tells.", "false_positive_risks": "Vibes with nothing to infer.", "minimal_example": "He laughs it off, but keeps the suitcase packed by the door.", "counterexample": "Mysterious mood paragraphs with no behavioral echo.", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_habit", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "habit", "description": "Repeated behaviors and coping patterns built around the wound.", "detection_hint": "Overpreparing, detachment, perfectionism, control, numbing routines.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off outburst unrelated to pattern.", "minimal_example": "She triple-checks locks every night; he deletes apologies he drafts.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_trigger", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "trigger", "description": "Situation reopens the wound; intensity spikes.", "detection_hint": "Anniversaries, sensory cues, role collisions; disproportionate reactions.", "false_positive_risks": "Random tantrum for drama only.", "minimal_example": "Hearing the siren freezes him mid-sentence; she skips the elevator, shaking.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_fallout", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "fallout", "description": "Tangible consequences to work, relationships, reputation, or safety.", "detection_hint": "Breakups, lost chances, public errors; costs persist.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle followed by reset.", "minimal_example": "The group chat goes silent for a month; the grant is pulled.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_healing", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "healing", "description": "Coping evolves toward integration or acceptance.", "detection_hint": "Boundary-setting, confessions, therapy, repaired trust; new habits.", "false_positive_risks": "Instant cure after one speech.", "minimal_example": "He names the fear and asks for a pause; she returns the key and stays anyway.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_strength_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Bare scar: vague, reversible, mostly private; low publicness/cost.", "detection_hint": "Hints with minimal effect on choices; faint echoes.", "false_positive_risks": "Decorative backstory with zero impact.", "minimal_example": "Heart race at the phone, then steady; routines unchanged.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_strength_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "The mark that shapes: visible in choices/relationships; reversible costs.", "detection_hint": "Triggers, guardedness, push–pull intimacy; consequences that matter.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy conflict with no causal thread.", "minimal_example": "She avoids intimacy and a good thing slips away; later she tries again.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "signal_id": "sig_strength_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Core scar: public, costly, identity-shaping; irreversible beats.", "detection_hint": "Breakdowns, confessions, whistleblowing, sacrifices; no reset.", "false_positive_risks": "Shock-only reveal forgotten next chapter.", "minimal_example": "He signs the report on camera; alliances change and stay changed.", "counterexample": "—", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "misconception_id": "checkbox_backstory", "description": "Treating wound as a static backstory fact.", "tells": "One line bio; no present impact.", "likely_causes": "Plot scaffolding replacing psychology.", "corrective_feedback": "Integrate hints→habits→triggers→fallout in-scene.", "micro_drill": "Replace backstory line with 2 behaviors + 1 cost.", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "misconception_id": "pain_olympics", "description": "Escalating trauma for shock value rather than truth.", "tells": "Melodrama arms race.", "likely_causes": "Confusing intensity with authenticity.", "corrective_feedback": "Use specific, personal resonance; scale to stakes.", "micro_drill": "Write a quiet reveal that changes a decision.", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "misconception_id": "flaw_confusion", "description": "Mistaking symptom (jealousy/anger/control) for the underlying wound.", "tells": "Labeling habits as the wound.", "likely_causes": "Category error.", "corrective_feedback": "Name the hurt beneath the habit; show causal link.", "micro_drill": "Trace symptom→root→choice with consequence.", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "misconception_id": "static_wound", "description": "Wound never evolves in strength or coping; flat arc.", "tells": "Same beat repeated.", "likely_causes": "Fear of change.", "corrective_feedback": "Map Low↔Med↔High ladder; evolve coping.", "micro_drill": "Escalate at hinge scenes; soften after care.", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"concept_id": "wound", "misconception_id": "resetting", "description": "Aftermath vanishes; no carry-through.", "tells": "Status quo returns instantly.", "likely_causes": "Avoiding complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Keep at least one consequence alive across scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 3 echoes; keep one persistent.", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_wound_identify_phase_strength", "concept_id": "wound", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage by Wound Phase (hint/habit/trigger/fallout/healing) and Strength (low/med/high). Justify with one specific cue.", "expected_features": "Accurate phase+strength; evidence cites action/gesture/situation; notes consequence/publicness.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with precise evidence and consequence note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels off or evidence vague"}, "distractor_strategy": "Traps: generic backstory line; shock scene with reset.", "hint_steps": "1) Spot cue 2) Choose phase 3) Gauge strength by cost/publicness/reversibility", "variation_axes": "phase|strength", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_wound_modulate_intensity", "concept_id": "wound", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Raise or lower wound intensity in the same moment without changing adjectives—alter triggers, audience, and cost.", "expected_features": "Edits shift reversibility, visibility, and consequence; rhythm adjusts.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear shift with sticky changes", "Meets": "Some shift", "Developing": "Wordier, same stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Adjective inflation trap.", "hint_steps": "1) Add/remove trigger 2) Change who sees 3) Add/remove cost", "variation_axes": "stakes|publicness|reversibility", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_wound_chain_map", "concept_id": "wound", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Map Hint→Habit→Trigger→Fallout→Healing for one character; annotate how each step changes choices.", "expected_features": "Causal chain intact; echoes persist; healing credible.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Chain reads inevitable with echoes", "Meets": "Mostly causal", "Developing": "List-like; resets"}, "distractor_strategy": "Coincidental outcomes.", "hint_steps": "1) Place hint 2) Prove habit 3) Pick trigger 4) Land fallout 5) Show coping", "variation_axes": "sequence|cause_effect", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_wound_backstory_to_scene", "concept_id": "wound", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Replace a backstory sentence with two in-scene behaviors and one consequence that reveal the wound.", "expected_features": "Behavior + cost make the backstory line unnecessary.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Wound vivid in action with sticky cost", "Meets": "Some behavior/cost present", "Developing": "Still tells instead of shows"}, "distractor_strategy": "Pretty exposition.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose two behaviors 2) Add one consequence 3) Cut the tell", "variation_axes": "behavior|cost", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_wound_root_vs_symptom", "concept_id": "wound", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Given a passage, separate symptoms (flaw/defense) from the underlying wound and explain the link.", "expected_features": "Correctly distinguishes root vs symptom; cites causal evidence.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear chain: wound→defense→choice→cost", "Meets": "Reasonable inference", "Developing": "Vibes-only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Label-only traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Name pain 2) Name habit 3) Show the choice it drives", "variation_axes": "cause|effect", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_1", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "hint|low", "label": "strong", "text": "She laughs at the toast and pockets the unused reply card.", "context_tags": "avoidance|loneliness", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_2", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "habit|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He keeps three exit routes memorized and never takes the window seat.", "context_tags": "control|anxiety", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_3", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "trigger|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "The ringtone stops him mid-sentence; the meeting dissolves as he stares.", "context_tags": "panic|memory", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_4", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "fallout|high", "label": "strong", "text": "She leaks the file; the grant is revoked; her name trends for the wrong reason.", "context_tags": "public|irreversible", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_5", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "healing|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He names the fear aloud and asks for a slower plan; the team adapts.", "context_tags": "integration|boundary", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_weak_1", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "‘She had a tough childhood,’ and then nothing ever reflects it.", "context_tags": "checkbox_backstory", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_wound_weak_2", "concept_id": "wound", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Huge meltdown; next chapter everyone forgot.", "context_tags": "resetting", "source_file": "Character Wound.md", "source_md5": "93bbe4858758499ba9a47d687498158e", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:55:06.255075Z"}
